i solved the problem by setting up the proper
sound blaster setting that can be found at the 
start of the dosbox or in the dosbox.conf
file that is located at: 
start\dosbox-0.70\dosbox.conf
check out for the tag : [sblaster]
should be like this for default:
sbtype=sb16
sbbase=220
irq=7
dma=1
hdma=5
mixer=true
oplmode=auto
oplrate=22050

in setup.exe in death rally folder try this
soundblaster\pro\16\awe... 
then 220
thwn irq7
then dma1
save and exit and try to hf
